Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Genetic \Ge*net"ic\ (j[-e]*n[e^]t"[i^]k), a. 1. Same as {Genetical}. [1913 Webster]
2. Of or pertaining to genes or genetics; as, the genetic code. [PJC]

genetic adj 1: tending to occur among members of a family usually by heredity; "an inherited disease"; "familial traits"; "genetically transmitted features" [syn: {familial}, {hereditary}, {inherited}, {transmitted}, {transmissible}] 2: of or relating to or produced by or being a gene; "genic combinations"; "genetic code" [syn: {genic}] 3: of or relating to the science of genetics; "genetic research" [syn: {genetical}]
